dt: {bc}to offer as example, reason, or proof in discussion or analysis

dt.t: {wi}adduce{/wi} evidence in support of a theory

et: Middle English {it}adducen,{/it} borrowed from Anglo-French & Latin; Anglo-French {it}aducer,{/it} borrowed from Latin {it}addūcere{/it} "to lead or bring (a person or an animal to a place), introduce, bring forward," from {it}ad-{/it} {et_link|ad-|ad-} + {it}dūcere{/it} "to lead" {ma}{mat|tow:1|}{/ma}
shortdef: to offer as example, reason, or proof in discussion or analysis
